message_1: What reaction occurs between sodium and chlorine to produce sodium chloride and what is the balanced chemical equation for this synthesis reaction?
message_2:
The reaction between sodium and chlorine to produce sodium chloride is a synthesis reaction. In this reaction, sodium (Na) reacts with chlorine (Cl2) to form sodium chloride (NaCl). The balanced chemical equation for this synthesis reaction is:
